column2: I was charged twice for the same service
column3: Hi, I noticed two charges on my credit card for this month's billing. Can you look into this?
column5:
Dear Customer,

Thank you for bringing the double charge issue to our attention. I'm here to help you resolve this matter as soon as possible.

To begin the investigation, I would like you to log in to the billing portal at <https://billing.company.com> and navigate to "Transaction History." Please check for any duplicate entries with identical amounts, dates, or service descriptions. If you find such entries, please submit a ticket to our billing team with the correct transaction IDs for further processing. Refunds typically take between 5-7 business days to process and will appear on your credit card statement.

If you cannot find any duplicates, I would advise you to check with your bank for any pending authorizations.

Should you encounter any difficulty in locating the transaction IDs or if the issue persists, please let me know, and I will be happy to escalate the matter to a human agent for
column6:

column2: I was charged twice for the same service
column3: Hi, I noticed two charges on my credit card for this month's billing. Can you look into this?
column5:
Hello Customer,

I'm sorry to hear that you've been charged twice for the same service this month. I understand this can be frustrating. To help resolve this issue, please follow these steps:

1. Log in to the billing portal at https://billing.company.com.
2. Navigate to "Transaction History" to review your recent charges.
3. Look for any duplicate entries with identical amounts, dates, or service descriptions.

If you find duplicate charges, please submit a ticket to our billing team with the transaction IDs for both charges. Refunds typically process within 5-7 business days and will appear on your credit card statement.

If no duplicates are found, I suggest checking with your bank for pending authorizations.

Should you encounter any difficulty or if the issue persists, please don't hesitate to escalate by providing evidence of the duplicate charges or contacting our support team directly.

Best regards,
Support Team.

1. Log in to the billing portal at https://billing.company.com.
2. Navigate to "Transaction History" to review your recent charges.
3. Look for any duplicate entries with identical amounts, dates, or service descriptions.

If you find duplicate charges, submit a ticket to our billing team with the transaction IDs for a refund. Refunds typically process within 5-7 business days and will appear on your credit card statement.

If you don't see any duplicate charges, check with your bank for pending authorizations.

If you need assistance with subscription issues, please verify your account status under "Subscriptions" in the billing portal and ensure your active plan matches your intended service.

Should you encounter any difficulties or require further assistance, please don't hesitate to escalate the issue to a human agent by providing evidence of the duplicate charges or any other relevant information.
